attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
road re-griting is cheap and non afective as well as dangerous.
the loose grit flyes up and dameges pait work,windscreens and radiators.
if the grit lifts you have plane tarr which when wet is almost like ice,black ice forms quick when cold. often roads have to be done again and again or in the end tarmackrd properley.
